page.title: 18Nesley Farm:A Worker's Day.
page.content: I have farmed for fifty-one years. I have been at Nesley Farm for thirty-nine years.The four other workers and I live near the farm.I work a 40 hour week and enjoy my job. My hobbies include gardening,playing skittles and darts and drinking beer! I get up at 6.30 each morning.My day varies:I might be preparing fields, spraying them or building,tiling or plumbing.I usually finish at about 4.30. For breakfast I eat cereal (usually Cornflakes).I eat cake and meat sandwiches for lunch.I have a cooked meal in the evening.None of my food comes from the farm.I grow my own vegetables.I reckon to spend about half of my pay on food.
